pages.title: Alchemist's amulet

categories.title: Category:Pages that contain switch infobox data

pages.extract:
The alchemist's amulet is an item purchased from the Mixology Rewards shop with 6,900 Mox resin, 5,650 Aga resin, and 7,400 Lye resin, which are earned from participating in the Mastering Mixology minigame. While the amulet is equipped, there is a 15% chance the player will create a potion with an extra dose when brewing potions (but with no extra experience), which consumes one charge. This effect works when adding secondaries to potions with fewer than 4 doses, such as anti-venom and stamina potions.
When first purchased, the amulet is pre-charged with 50 uses. Additional charges can be added by using amulets of chemistry on it, each giving 10 charges, up to a maximum of 5,000. On average, each Amulet of chemistry added will last for ~67 potions made, giving a fully charged Alchemist's amulet ~33,333 potions made, of which, 5,000 will have an extra dose.
When the player uncharges the amulet, it returns amulets of chemistry in noted form, equal to the number of charges divided by 10 (rounded down).
Unlike the amulet of chemistry, there is no option on the amulet to stop the player from making potions once it has depleted all charges.
If killed by a player while wearing this amulet unprotected, it will appear at your gravestone with 0 charges.
